<file path="source.cs">
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations;
using System.Linq;
using System.Linq.Expressions;
using System.Reflection;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
namespace Constructs.Complex04
public sealed class StringRangeAttribute : ValidationAttribute
    public readonly int Min;
    public readonly int Max;
    public void StringRangeAttribute(int min, int max)
    public override bool IsValid(object value)
public class ModelValidatorBuilder
    public static Func Build()
    -private static readonly Dictionary _validatorCache = new();
    ~internal static void ClearCache()
    -private static Expression BuildComplexValidation(param ParameterExpression, property PropertyInfo)
public class SignupRequest
    public readonly string Username;
    public readonly string Password;
    public bool IsPasswordStrong()
    -private bool _hasUpperCase()
    -private bool _hasLowerCase()
    -private bool _hasNumber()
public class Demo
    public static async Task ConsumeAsync(IAsyncEnumerable inputs)
    -private static async IAsyncEnumerable GenerateTestRequests()
public class ServiceLocator
    -private readonly Dictionary _services = new();
    public void Register(instance T)
    public T Resolve()
    -private T CreateInstance()
    ~internal Type[] GetRegisteredTypes()
    *protected virtual bool ValidateService(serviceType Type)
</file>
